original_title: Four Wayamba Uni. students remanded over ragging incident
original_body_lines: The Kuliyapitiya Magistrate’s Court today (26) ordered the remand of four third-year students of the Wayamba University who were arrested in connection with the alleged ragging of a second-year student at the same university.
The suspects were produced before the court earlier today, following which the Magistrate ordered that they be remanded until September 29, said Ada Derana reporter.
